name: Artic Romance
description:
A quick little visual novel made in 48 hours with a team of 6 for the IGDA Becker Chapter Tutorial Game Jam.

Date either a penguin or a snowman in the arctic tundra during your polar expedition!

Special thanks to Chenxi (Turtle), Dan (Pancake), Bryant (Branch), Adrian (JungleBat), and Dustin (Radical Artillery) who made this along with me!

Play in 1920 x 1080 if you can. Don't yell at me if you can't.
